name: Hellish Rebuke

casting_time.trigger: which you take in response to taking damage from a creature that you can see within 60 feet of yourself

description: The creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by green flames. It makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d10 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 1.
